changePassword.pwdMatchError: Passwords do not match, Please enter the password again
changePassword.pwdInfo: In order to protect your account, make sure your password:
changePassword.mixtureUL: A mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters.
changePassword.mixtureLN: A mixture of letters and numbers.
changePassword.specialChar: Inclusion of at least one special character.
changePassword.relogin: Please login with your new password
changePassword.jwtError: Token expired, Please try again requesting for a new reset link

details.name: Plan Name

details.tooltipTextPolicyTerm: Coverage duration of policy issued on plan
details.tooltipTextPolicyCurrency: Base currency of policy issued on plan

terms.title: Terms
terms.effectiveEndDateError: Effective End Date cannot be same or earlier than effective start date
terms.policyTermError: The policy term in years is out of bounds

billing.toolBillingCurrencies: Currencies option for issuing policy premium bill
billing.toolBillingMethod: Billing methods option to collect policy premium e.g bank transfer
billing.toolBillingModes: Modes indicates frequency of premium payment of policy
billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.billingMethodsHelpText: System pre-configured as one billing method under this environment

deathBenefitModule.title: Death Benefit
deathBenefitModule.deathBenefitModuleRequired: Must choose at least one formula for death benefit.
deathBenefitModule.widgetInfo:
Death claims function calculates claim amount as per Formula with also parameter of death benefit percentage

Claim function have pre-defined rules, if you want to put more validation rules, then configure Rules
1. Claim incident < Paid to date
2. Coverage is active and enforced

coi.title: Cost of Insurance (COI)
coi.formulaRequired: Must choose at least one formula for COI.
coi.toolSumAssured: Allowable range of Sum Assured (base amount)  of policy
coi.toolTaxRate: Tax rate is the charge applied on premium which is regulatory in nature e.g. Levy, GST
coi.coimoduleRequired: Must choose at least one formula for COI.
coi.heading: COI is the Regular Basic Premium amount paid by policy owner together with Top Up Deposit.
coi.widgetInfo:
COI Function requires a Formula, select one from the Formulas button.

COI Function is made up of pre-defined parameters that need your input. Each parameter is made up of pre-defined business rules. Hover your cursor over each parameter to view the business rules.

investmentConfiguration.withdrawalValue: must be > 0 and <= Maximum Withdrawal Amount
investmentConfiguration.minWithdrawalAmountError: Please enter the minimum withdrawal amount
investmentConfiguration.maxWithdrawalAmountError: Please enter the maximum withdrawal amount
investmentConfiguration.minMaxWithdrawalError: Maximum withdrawal amount should be greater than minimum withdrawal amount
investmentConfiguration.minAccountBalanceValue: The minimum account balance must be greater than or equal to 0

underwriting.title: Underwriting
underwriting.minPolicyOwnerAgeErrorlt: Value must be less than Maximum Policy Owner Age
underwriting.minIssueValue: The minimum issue age is out of bounds.
underwriting.maxIssueValue: The maximum issue age is out of bounds.
underwriting.faceValue: Value must be > 0 and <= Maximum Sum Assured
underwriting.widgetInfo:
Underwriting Function is made up of pre-defined parameters that need your input. Each parameter is made up of pre-defined business rules. Hover your cursor over each parameter to view the business rules.

Need more business rules for Underwriting Function? Create new rules from the Rules button

renewal.title: Renewal
renewal.maxRenewalValue: The maximum renewal age is out of bounds.

Need more business rules for Renewal Function? Create new rules from the Rules button

noClaimDiscount.title: No Claim Discount
noClaimDiscount.noClaimConsecutiveYears: Number Of Consecutive Years With No Claims

lapsation.title: Lapsation
lapsation.gracePeriod: Period after due date during which payment is allowed without any charges and penalties

surrender.surrenderRatePercentageError: Please enter a surrender rate percentage between 0% and 100.00%
surrender.coolingOffPeriod: Period during which customer is allowed to cancel policy without charges

alertMessages.errorMessage: Enter all mandatory fields to save plan
alertMessages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete?
alertMessages.statusConfirm: Are you sure that you want to change status

rulesCategory.IG_RULE_SUBCATEGORY_PREVALIDATION_DESCRI: Validation rules are defined to validate data input and are processed before performing any major financial activity under a business process. Any Fail condition will reject the Surrender process.
rulesCategory.IG_RULE_SUBCATEGORY_POSTVALIDATION_DESCR: Validation rules are defined to validate data input and are processed after performing any major financial activity under a bussiness process
rulesCategory.IG_RULE_SUBCATEGORY_CALCULATION_DESCRIPT: Calculations rules are defined to modify / alter principal amount of a business process e.g. claim amount, premium amount. Any Pass condition will include the Modifier rate or Modifier excess in the refund fee amount.
rulesCategory.processHelpText: Rules will be processed by priority.
rulesCategory.parameterHelpText: Name of an input business object for rules (e.g., Age).
rulesCategory.parameterTypeHelpText: Data type of the input business object (e.g., Numeric).
rulesCategory.constantHelpText: Numeric, String or Date format YYYY-MM-DD
